Verses: 1 dhevanudaiya Siththaththinaale Yesukiristhuvin Apposthalanaagiya Pavulum, Sagodharanaagiya Theemoththeyum,

2 kolose Pattanaththil Kiristhuvukkul Parisuththavaangalum Visuvaasigalumaayirukkira Sagodharargalukku Ezhudhugiradhaavadhu: Nammudaiya Pidhaavaagiya Dhevanaalum Karththaraagiya Yesukiristhuvinaalum Ungalukkuk Kirubaiyum Samaadhaanamum Undaavadhaaga.
3 kiristhu Yesuvinmelulla Ungal Visuvaasaththaiyum, Parisuththavaangalellaarmelumulla Ungal Anbaiyunkuriththu Naangal Kelvippattu,
4 paralogaththil Ungalukkaaga Vaiththirukkira Nambikkaiyinimiththam,
5 nammudaiya Karththaraagiya Yesukiristhuvin Pidhaavaagiya Dhevanukku Sthoththiranjseluththi, Eppozhudhum Ungalukkaaga Vendudhal Seygirom.

6 andha Nambikkaiyaikkuriththu, Neengal Munname Saththiyavasanamaagiya Suviseshaththinaale Kelvippatteergal; Andha Suvisesham Ulagamengum Parambip Balantharugiradhupola, Ungalidaththilum Vandhu, Neengal Adhaik Kettu, Dhevakirubaiyai Saththiyaththinpadi Arindhukonda Naalmudhal, Adhu Ungalukkullum Balantharugiradhaayirukkiradhu;
7 adhai Engalukkup Piriyamaana Udanvelaiyaalum, Ungalukkaagak Kiristhuvin Unmaiyaana Oozhiyakkaaranumaayirukkira Eppaappiraavinidaththil Neengal Katrarindhirukkireergal;
8 aavikkullaana Ungal Anbaiyum Avane Engalukkuth Theriyappaduththinaan.

9 idhinimiththam, Naangal Adhaikketta Naalmudhal Ungalukkaaga Idaividaamal Jebampannugirom; Neengal Ellaa Gnaanaththodum, Aavikkuriya Vivegaththodum Avarudaiya Siththaththai Arigira Arivinaale Nirappappadavum,
10 sagalavidha Narkiriyaigalumaagiya Kanigalaith Thandhu, Dhevanai Arigira Arivil Viruththiyadaindhu, Karththarukkup Piriyamundaaka Avarukkup Paaththiraraai Nadandhukollavum,
11 sandhoshaththode Koodiya Ellaapporumaiyum Neediyasaandhamum Undaavadharku, Magimaiyaana Avarudaiya Vallamaiyinpadi, Ellaa Vallamaiyaalum Balappaduththappadavum, Ungalukkaaga Vendudhalseygirom.
12 oliyilulla Parisuththavaangaludaiya Sudhandharaththil Pangadaivadharku, Nammaith Thagudhiyullavargalaakkinavarum,
13 irulin Adhigaaraththinindru Nammai Vidudhalaiyaakki, Thamadhu Anbin Kumaaranudaiya Raajyaththirku Utpaduththinavarumaayirukkira Pidhaavai Sthoththirikkirom.
14 [kumaaranaagiya] Avarukkul, Avarudaiya Iraththaththinaale, Paavamannippaagiya Meetpu Namakku Undaayirukkiradhu.
15 avar Adharisanamaana Dhevanudaiya Tharsuroobamum, Sarva Sirushtikkum Mundhina Perumaanavar.

16 enendraal Avarukkul Sagalamum Sirushtikkappattadhu; Paralogaththilullavaigalum Poologaththilullavaigalumaagiya Kaanappadugiravaigalum Kaanappadaadhavaigalumaana Sagala Vasthukkalum, Singaasanangalaanaalum, Karththaththuvangalaanaalum, Thuraiththanangalaanaalum, Adhigaarangalaanaalum, Sagalamum Avaraikkondum Avarukkendrum Sirushtikkappattadhu.
17 avar Ellaavatrirkum Mundhinavar, Ellaam Avarukkul Nilainirkiradhu.
18 avare Sabaiyaagiya Sareeraththukkuth Thalaiyaanavar; Ellaavatrilum Mudhalvaraayirukkumpadi, Avare Aadhiyum Mariththorilirundhu Ezhundha Mudharperumaanavar.
19 sagala Paripooranamum Avarukkulle Vaasamaayirukkavum,

20 avar Siluvaiyil Sindhina Raththaththinaale Samaadhaanaththai Undaakki, Poologaththilullavaigal Paralogaththilullavaigal Yaavaiyum Avar Moolamaaith Thamakku Oppuravaakkikkollavum Avarukkup Piriyamaayitru.

21 munne Anniyaraayum Dhurkkiriyaigalinaal Manadhile Saththurukkalaayumirundha Ungalaiyum Parisuththaraagavum Kutramatravargalaagavum Kandikkappadaadhavargalaagavum Thamakku Mun Niruththumpadiyaaga Avarudaiya Maamsa Sareeraththil Adaindha Maranaththinaale Ippozhudhu Oppuravaakkinaar.
22 neengal Ketta Suviseshaththinaal Undaagum Nambikkaiyaivittu Asaiyaamal, Sthiramaayum Urudhiyaayum Visuvaasaththile Nilaiththiruppeergalaanaal Appadiyaagum.
23 andha Suvisesham Vaanaththin Keezhirukkira Sagala Sirushtigalukkum Pirasangikkappattuvarugiradhu; Adharkendre Pavulaagiya Naan Oozhiyakkaaranaanen.

24 ippozhudhu Naan Ungal Nimiththam Anubavikkira Paadugalil Sandhoshamadaindhu, Kiristhuvinudaiya Ubaththiravangalil Kuraivaanadhai Avarudaiya Sareeramaagiya Sabaikkaaga, En Maamsaththil Niraivetrugiren.

25 aadhikaalangalukkum Thalaimurai Thalaimuraigalukkum Maraivaayirundhu, Ippozhudhu Avarudaiya Parisuththavaangalukku Veliyaakkappatta Ragasiyamaagiya Dhevavasanaththaip Pooranamaaith Theriyappaduththugiradharku,
26 ungalporuttu Dhevanaal Enakku Alikkappatta Uththiyogaththinpadiye Naan Andha Sabaikku Oozhiyakkaaranaanen.

27 purajaadhigalukkulle Vilangiya Indha Ragasiyaththilulla Magimaiyin Aisuvariyam Innadhendru, Dhevan Thammudaiya Parisuththavaangalukkuth Theriyappaduththach Siththamaanaar; Kiristhuvaanavar Magimaiyin Nambikkaiyaaga Ungalukkul Iruppadhe Andha Ragasiyam.

28 endha Manushanaiyum Kiristhu Yesuvukkul Therinavanaaga Niruththumpadikku, Avaraiye Naangal Ariviththu, Endha Manushanukkum Buththisolli, Endha Manushanukkum Ellaa Gnaanaththodum Ubadhesampannugirom.
29 adharkaaga Naan Enakkulle Vallamaiyaaik Kiriyai Nadappikkira Avarudaiya Balaththinpadi Poraadip Pirayaasappadugiren.
